game_description: Set out on a journey to restore life to a ruined civilization with Kemono and Chibi. The unlikely pair can use their restorative powers to bring back plants and life to a decayed city. Help them remove the "Kegare" using their combined powers. Will you be able to restore life to the city before it's too late?
review_1: A fun and well-made game inspired by two of my favourite franchises (Zelda and Okami)! See it in action in the video below (remove the space before "be"): https://youtu. be/bz-8l1aWAcM
review_2: It's a cool game but, I seem to get bored extremely fast. And I get confused what to do
